ReviewText: This is the first dry shampoo I've tried and I really like it. This works great as a touch-up throughout the day if my hair is getting oily. The scent is really cute and nice, too.
Title: Great for hair touch-ups

Description: For damaged or thinning hair. Patented NIA-114TM + Fibramend Ceramide Complex. Make a lasting recovery. Intensive treatment starts at the scalp surface to restore essential moisture while restructuring and smoothing overworked strands. Deeply nourishes for renewed vitality, resilience and softness. Free of sulfates (SLS/SLES), parabens, phthalates, and synthetic dyes. Safe for colour or chemically treated hair.
ReviewText: Yes, this product does what it says it will do.  I use a lot of products from the Strivectin line and am happy with all of them.  I have fine, shoulder-length hair, it's not damaged but it IS fine.  I use this mask in place of my regular Nexxus conditioner and it's great.  It doesn't weigh down the hair, doesn't make it oily and gives a nice boost of body.  I've only ever used it once or twice a week, when I want my hair to look especially nice and it does a good job.  It looks like a heavy cream but it rinses clean and leaves your hair soft and manageable with no static.  Great for fine hair.  I really love this product.
Title: Great product

ReviewText: I had tried a sample of this mask and I fell in love with one use. It left my hair smooth and hydrated. I loved the fact that it has to be massaged into the scalp unlike many other masks. I have thinning hair and hair loss and my hair and scalp is extremely dry and with one use I felt that my hair is hydrated and healthy. Despite the price, I decided to purchase a full size. I need to mention that this smelled a bit different than the sample I used, this has a rose water smell. Hopefully I will see greater results when the jar is finished. I gave it 4 star since I have only used it twice hopefully that will change when I am purchasing my second jar.

ReviewText:
I noticed improvement in the quality and feel of my hair from the first time I used it. Problem is, I have thick, coarse medium length hair, that eats up product. There's only enough in the jar for about 5 applications. Also, it has a light, fresh scent. As with most deep conditioners, the longer you leave it on, the better.

I will probably buy again if it ever goes on sale or points promotion. But I'll save it until my hair needs serious intervention.

Protective conditioner deposits low molecular weight proteins to fortify overprocessed strands while defending against colour fade. Seals in moisture to resist future damage from colouring and environmental stressors. Free of sulfates (SLS/SLES), parabens, phthalates, and synthetic dyes. Safe for colour or chemically treated hair.
ReviewText: Most conditioners that are meant for color care, weigh my hair down and make my hair look greasy. Not this conditioner. This conditioner made is super soft and full of bounce. The smell is awesome in the shower, I wish it lasted longer. Definitely recommend this conditioner.

ReviewText: I bought this about a month ago now and I have to say it is the best dryer I have ever owned! Its very fast to dry and relatively quite compared to other dryers. The cord is really long which is also a bonus. The barrel brush the comes with it is also a nice touch, it helps give a smooth look. I also think that the white and rose gold colours are right on trend.

Product Name: french vanilla bean shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: This fun-loving shower gel duo offers you a yummy, freshly baked waffle cone scent that is utterly irresistible when paired with the purely sweet, creamy scent of french vanilla bean ice cream. our 3-in-1 multitasking formula gently cleanses and conditions, leaving skin and hair feeling hydrated and super soft.
ReviewText: I love all of Philosophy's 3 in one shampoo/shower gel/bubble baths, but the french vanilla bean one is my favourite scent. It doesn't have the artificial vanilla scent that you find in other low end bath products. It smells like real vanilla bean and is not overpoweringly sweet! I use it mostly as a shower gel, but it gives a great amount of bubbles in a bath as well! Using Philosophy's shower gel feels so luxurious and I would recommend it to everyone!
Title: Lovely Vanilla Scent

ReviewText: I have been a philosophy fan for years and I only use the shower gels on my skin and hair and this one is awesome!!! It smells just like The ice cream man that is sold on QVC so if you like that one or a warm vanilla scent then you should get this!! I use it in my hair and now my hair smells great and it's very soft and smooth! You have to try this one, you won't regret it!

I will still use this scent and enjoy it; however, I wasn't expecting the slight butterscotch candy note that I'm getting. This won't be a repurchase but I did like it enough to not return it. I would probably suggest Cinnamon Buns if you're looking for a creamy, vanilla foodie scent.

In love.

Description: For damaged or thinning Hair. Rebuilds resilience and vitality. Ultimate Restore formulas deeply nourish, revitalize, and reduce breakage for root to tip transformation of damaged or thinning hair. Free of sulfates and synthetic dyes. Safe for colour or chemically treated hair.
ReviewText: like systems so I purchased all three.  I have thinning hair from medication but am on city water so I thought I would see if this would help. The small shampoo bottle only gave me two washes which did get me very clean but I would think I would get a little more use than that. I did like the Restorative for my scalp and finished with the  Conditioner each time and have some left.  I will see how those work with another high quality shampoo.  I am very happy with those two products and am considering a reorder on those.  I must add this is the first time I have been disappointed with a Strivectin product!  And I have tried a lot of them.

Description: For damaged or thinning Hair. Rebuilds resilience and vitality. Ultimate Restore formulas deeply nourish, revitalize, and reduce breakage for root to tip transformation of damaged or thinning hair. Free of sulfates and synthetic dyes. Safe for colour or chemically treated hair.
ReviewText: My hair has recently started thinning at the front due to heredity and breakage, which means I had to start wearing bangs to cover it but it was still visible. I've been using Ultimate Restore for about a month now, and I'm starting to notice baby hairs at the front of my hairline getting thicker and more prolific. The biggest thinning area has no significant change yet, but I'm pretty sure that regular use will get it there!
Title: Does what it claims

Description: For damaged or thinning Hair. Rebuilds resilience and vitality. Ultimate Restore formulas deeply nourish, revitalize, and reduce breakage for root to tip transformation of damaged or thinning hair. Free of sulfates and synthetic dyes. Safe for colour or chemically treated hair.
ReviewText: Strivectin is one of 3 brands that actually does what it says. It doesn't just plump temporarily. It really does diminish tighten etc. You'll see a big difference even with the first product they had which is the stretch mark cream. You can tell week to week the difference on your face neck hands chest. Wonderful product. Expensive yes. But we tend to forget you don't need to slather. Just a thin covering. A tube should do your face neck and chest three months if done correctly.

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: as others have said, there is a slight lemony after note to this one, but the main scent is warm, very sweet, vanilla, and feels exactly like a cookie fresh from the oven with soft frosting. the only thing you'll find missing is the sprinkles! i bought this and was very surprised as to how relaxed i felt after using it, so now this sits in my summer shower rotation as "relax" and next to the "energizing" blue raspberry. my husband dislikes the scent, but this one is one that doesn't linger, so again, this scent is perfect! i am considering buying another just in case this disappears like so many of my favorites!
Title: Surprisingly relaxing scent!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
pink frosted animal cracker is becoming one of my favorite philosophy "bakery note" shower gels. i just find this scent hypnotizing...the warm comforting smell of fresh baked cookies balanced with a tarte lemon scent that literally makes me crave cookies. it smells too good, i don't want to get out of the bathtub with this one!

it's a nice strong scent that doesn't get lost in a bathtub full of water, when used as a shower gel the scent is even stronger. it is a thick creamy opague formula, rich and moisturizing.

i can't believe they didn't make a body lotion for this scent...we need one! please keep this scent in the permanent inventory and supersize it (i need the 32 oz size!).
Title: one of the very best "bakery" scents

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: smells extremely similar to the previous frosted animal cracker (if not exactly the same) but coloured pink this time around. i don't get any of the pink notes, its just that super delicious scent of faintly lemon kissed sweet biscuit-y goodness. the formula is same, very rich, thick and creamy. if you are like me and have an obscene hoard from last year, you wont need to get this one, but is a good opportunity to stock up if you missed the boat last year. they really need to bring out a matching lotion already, its not like its a secret how much we all love this scent.
Title: deja vu- frosted animal cracker #2

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: pink frosted animal cracker.. i just love that name lol it makes me smile when I use this... the scent is remarkably similar to the pink frosted layer cake scent that was discontinued a couple years ago... there were a few other pink frosted varieties and they are all pretty much the same but all very good, warm, sweet, vanilla-y type scents... plus the pink looks so cute in your shower that you will just jump in and get happy even when it's a dreary day outside... if you are looking for one for the kids, this is perfect... my son loves the 3 in 1's cuz they get very bubbly in his bath as they also work as not only shower gel, but also bubble bath, and shampoo... they are not drying to the skin, and keep his baby skin so soft!
Title: Pink frosted layer cake's little sister

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: i was excited to see this shower gel come out - i bought the original frosted animal cracker for a friend, and by the time i got around to trying it, it was sold out. this smells exactly like you opened a bag of frosted animal crackers - sweet, delicious, and with a tiny hint of lemon for that authentic animal cracker scent. the pink color is an added bonus, although, and this is so creamy and moisturizing in the shower. once again, philosophy has managed to re-create a delicious scent perfectly :)
Title: smells just like a frosted animal cracker!!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: this one really smells like the animal crackers it's named for! i can smell the baked cookie scent, mild lemon with sweet frosting on top. when i first tried this, i had to buy a bag of animal crackers when i went to the store because this shower gel made me crave them. i love to use this one for shampoo because i can smell the scent in my hair throughout the day and it smells sooo wonderful!!! i just love the bakery scents so much and philosophy does them so well.
Title: smells like fun!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: the scent is creamy lemon. for anyone who may steer clear of the foodie scents you should give this a try! I adore Philosophy, but my personal likes are not to choose the sweet food scents to wash.....this is very refreshing and comforting. i find pink frosted animal cracker to be lux and comforting all at the same time. the bubbles and moisture which envelop you in the shower/bath is what makes this line stand out from the rest. i was so happy to see the return of a frosted animal cracker - but I was equally happy that the scent was basically identical, just with a little pink! i have 3 bottles of the original and I will be stock piling this one just in case it does not stick around. Philosophy, please consider a lotion in this scent. it has quite a following and would make an absolutely decadent and yummy all over mosturizer. Lotion - Please!
Title: lotion please!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
I really love this scent - it's very true to the smell of frosted animal crackers you can buy at the store. I just wish I could smell it on me after the shower. Even still, smelling this body wash makes me enjoy showers so much more and it lasts a long time.

It's pretty decent as a shampoo, but after a few weeks of use, I felt like my hair was a little too greasy so I switched back to my regular stuff. Great as a body wash though.
Title: Smells like frosting!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath

Sweet, sugary, buttery, crispy cookie goodness drenched in a sweet, creamy coating is exactly what you will find in this bottle. Title: dreamy!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
It was hard deciding what scent to select but this is a new one and it is wonderful. I was with a group of friends of both guys and the girls:
the girls struggles between animal cracker and cinnamon buns..but chose animal cracker in the end. The guys, however, loved animal cracker as top w/ no hesitation.
It lathers really well and the scent is buttery, sweet and soft...not overpowering. Its a nice difference for those of you who have grown bored with vanilla frosting and cake scents but still like the baked goods appeal.
And the scent lingers! I use this as my 2nd wash when washing my hair. Its not too moisturizing in general but I dont use it as a cleanser but for the scent. I use my own personal choice of shampoo first and then a quick slick over the top of hair and rinse and my hair smells edible all day long. the bf LOVES it.
I bought mine at the commissary for a bit cheaper than the norm, but I'd totally pay full price for this again. It last for a very long time as a little goes a long way! Good job philosophy!
Title: So yummy!!

ReviewText:
thank you philosophy, you really outdid yourself - pink frosted animal cracker is just as good, if not better than last year's original frosted animal cracker!

it smells just like the original frosted animal cracker ... open up a bottle of the new "pink" cracker and you are immediately treated to the mouthwatering scent of lemony, frosted, crispy baked cookies ... it's just like a having bag of the mothers circus animal cookies in my shower - utterly delicious!

the scent is very strong, not weak at all, and it really does linger on my hands even after i'm out of the shower.

i was madly in love with the original frosted animal cracker last year, and was sad to be down to the last bottle. so i can't tell you how pleased i was to see the new "pink" addition this year! this time i stocked up so i won't have to worry about running out any time too soon ;-)

the formula is just as rich and creamy as it could ever be, so my skin still feels soft and hydrated, no matter how long i stay in the shower using this product.

you know, i have to agree with the other reviewers ... the only thing that could make it better would be a matching lotion or even a matching body spritz, hint hint!
Title: just like mothers circus animal cookies!!

Title: SUPER SIZE IT!!!

Description: Specially designed  for weakened hair in women, PHYTOCYANE SERUM combines the benefits of a fortifying hair treatment to stimulate growth, with the assets of an enhancing cosmetic treatment. From the very first applications, hair becomes fuller, thicker and more resistant. For weakened hair  women.
ReviewText:
I went through a bit of a rough patch with my health, and started losing hair at a slightly alarming rate. Started using this stuff, and within a month, there was clearly abundant new growth. I now use this off and on, at least a couple times a year, and my hair has never been healthier.

I would have rated it 5 stars but for this minor quibble with packaging - the product comes in a sealed glass ampoule which you have to break cleanly at the neck, then you put the plastic applicator tube over the broken end. If your break isn't clean, say there's a bit of sharp glass sticking out, or there's a crack, you basically just wasted an ampoule (unless you want to risk bits of broken glass on your head). So it requires a certain amount of care to apply.

ReviewText: First a note about my hair and water: my hair is highlighted and the water is hard (from a well) so I have a lot of trouble finding products that moisturize my dry hair while still rinsing cleanly. This shampoo and conditioner set left my hair shiny, soft, bright and manageable. From the first use my hair felt more elastic and less coarse. Both the shampoo and conditioner rinsed cleanly enough that I could use them every other day (my preferred method). My ends were smooth not dry and frizzy. I was provided with free sample but will be purchasing full sized products for continued use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had the opportunity to sample StriVectins Ultimate Restore Hair products; I love them (shampoo and conditioner)! I honestly like them better than my current conditioner (and shampoo). The StriVectin conditioner had an extremely faint pleasant scent. I only used a little more than a quarter size amount of conditioner. The small amount went a long way. It is not a heavy or thick conditioner, but the end result is the same as using a heavy /thick conditioner. The StriVectin conditioner did not weigh my hair down which I like. My hair feels light, silky and styles easily. It also took the frizz out of my hair and gave it a nice shine! I really recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Conditioning properties were underwhelming to me, but passable. It was difficult to get all the tangles/knots of my hair. I have VERY fine/weak/dry hair, and when I wash it, the act of washing it, usually creates knots/tangles. I have to brush my hair wet in the shower (per hair stylists recommendation) so that I won't damage my hair. I need a conditioner that will aid in the brushing process. This conditioner sadly fell short in that area. MY hair did not feel any more restored than when I started. However, my hair was very dry/damaged to begin with, so you may have a better result. The scent is wonderful and the conditioner is light. It felt luxurious as I fingered it through my long strands, working it down to the ends. Left it on for a couple minutes while I washed my body in the shower. Then rinsed it out completely and thoroughly. I put in a pea-sized amount of styling gel after towel drying, then let my hair air dry. Later I blow dried it to style. I had no tangles or knots, and my hair was silky smooth. I had used Strivectin shampoo first, so combined, these products are winners. I loved my results of full volumized silky strands!
I would purchase the product and recommend it to friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

ReviewText:
I'm using this product with the StriVectin shampoo, and have applied the two products three times so far. I find that a small amount-- no more than about a half-teaspoon for me-- fully treats my hair and my scalp without a lot of waxiness or oiliness. I had to get used to the idea of applying a conditioner directly to my scalp, but I find that it's effectively treating winter dryness without weighing down the top or leaving me with an unwashed feeling at my roots.
The shampoo and conditioner combo are doing a pretty impressive job of restoring volume to my fine, curly, thinning hair. A week ago, if I looked at my hair straight on in a mirror I could easily see scalp shining through all the way back to my crown-- and my part was looking wider than ever. Today I have excellent volume, improved density and great curl without frizz of any kind. I'm pretty impressed with this hair care line, and with the conditioner in particular. ReviewText: I was initially a little skeptical of the product's claims to restore shine, softness and vitality to my hair, but after only one use, I have to say I am a believer. I opted to try out both the shampoo and conditioner as part of Strivectin's Sampling Community and I was truly impressed by the results I experienced. Being a 40-something active women with naturally thin and straight hair, I experience issues with breakage, frizz and dullness as a result of my lifestyle. After using both products once, I noticed a visible difference in not only the way my hair looked, but also the way it felt. The texture was smooth - all the way down to the ends (even after running a comb through it). Normally it takes about 5-7 minutes to blow dry my hair to the point where I can style it. I noticed that it took less time to dry and was super shiny (much like those Pantene commercials, although my hair never looked like that when I used Pantene). The only constructive feedback I have is regarding the scent - a little too medicinal for my taste, but it wasn't unpleasant, and others might prefer it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

ReviewText: So happy with this set! Saw instant results in my colored hair! Left it with a shine, evened out tone and even gave a lil volume.  Didn't expect help with my bleached to platinum from dark brunette hair, but to my surprise, I'm really loving the hair care line for colored hair ...I was surprised, but shouldn't have been. StriVectin has awesome skin care products, so the jump to using hair line products just makes sense.  A lil expensive, but worth it if you're interested in keeping colored hair looking great.

It was of a rich texture and  the fragrance reminded me of eggnog.I could hardly wait to purchase some for myself.It surprised me how little is required to lather and my hair felt so clean and silky. I am pleased I can order it online as I live in a remote area and this shampoo is not available locally.

The perfect balance between four complementary oils, rich in minerals, vitamins and essential fatty acids, this pre-shampoo concentrate replenishes lipids deep-down in ultra-dry hair fiber, protecting,

ReviewText: I bought this product a week ago because my hair was very damaged from coloring at home and was dry and bristle omg it was bad. But this product saved my hair. It's reviving oils really helped my scalp all the way to the tips of my hair. Massage gently and slowly let it penetrate your scalp very well. Never rush a hair treatment because it won't work. I recommend this product.

ReviewText: Cashed in my points and purchased this expensive hair appliance.  So glad I did.  I loved my old iron, but I'd already repaired the handle twice.  (That's how much I loved it.)  This exceeds my expectations and is my new favourite appliance.  The barrel that came with it is perfect for the current  length of my hair, but if I go short, I can buy a smaller barrel.  The barrel is very smooth, grips the hair, and is hot for a good, lasting curl.
Title: Love It

Description: Featuring new T3 HeatCore technology, the Volumizing Hot Rollers Luxe heat up fast and ensure optimum, balanced heat transfer for lasting volume, body, and shine. Dual temperature settings ensure long-lasting style for all hair types. CoolGrip rollers with velvet flocking are easy to handle and make wrapping a breeze. Includes 8 velvet flocked rollers, which are ideal for creating soft waves or voluminous curls, 8 crease-free clips to hold rollers firmly in place while preventing creases, and a luxurious case for easy storage and travel.
ReviewText: I bought this about three weeks ago, and it is absolutely the best curling system i ever used! It made my hair look amazing in minutes!!! I would totally recommend this product.

Title: Simply the BEST!!!

Description: Revitalize from root to tip. Gentle shampoo with a balanced pH comforts as it cleanses to soothe scalp without stripping hair of natural oils. Delivers vital nourishment for improved tensile strength.
ReviewText: I am a 43 year old female, my hair is shoulder length and naturally curly. I had the opportunity to sample StriVectins Ultimate Restore Hair products; I love them (shampoo and conditioner)! I honestly like them better than my current shampoo (and conditioner). The shampoo had an extremely faint pleasant scent. I only used a quarter size amount of shampoo and lathered up nicely. The first thing I noticed is that my hair felt thicker as I washed it and felt cleaner (removed a lot of built-up products). When I style my hair, it feels lighter, looks thicker and does not have a frizz to it. My hair feels and looks healthier. I really recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Title: Clean beautiful hair!

Description: Revitalize from root to tip. Gentle shampoo with a balanced pH comforts as it cleanses to soothe scalp without stripping hair of natural oils. Delivers vital nourishment for improved tensile strength.
ReviewText: I have written a more detailed review under the conditioner (see StephD24), so I won't repeat myself here. Overall this shampoo delivered in one use. It left my hair feeling clean without any stripping (which is often the case with a shampoo). My hair was shiny and I experienced no tangling when running a comb through it post-towel dry prior to blow drying. Similar to the conditioner, the only thing that I might change would be the fragrance, which leaned a little too close to medicinal for my taste, but it wasn't unpleasant and it would not deter me from purchasing the product given the results I had in just one application.

ReviewText: The sample size was small and I have shoulder length hair, so I barely got 3 uses out of it, so it is hard to tell what the long term affect might have been. My hair did seem to have more body using the ultimate restore shampoo and conditioner together. But, I did not feel like my hair was as clean. Also, I have occasional problems with dandruff, so this shampoo might not work for me for long term use. I usually have to use a new shampoo for at least 7-10 days before I decide if it is suitable for my needs. This shampoo and conditioner set left my hair shiny, soft, bright and manageable. From the first use my hair felt more elastic and less coarse. Both the shampoo and conditioner rinsed cleanly enough that I could use them every other day (my preferred method). My ends were smooth not dry and frizzy. I was provided with a free sample but will be buying full sized products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I didn't like the scent, but it is so light that it was almost unnoticeable, and it wouldn't interfere with any other scent you might use. It left my hair shinier than usual, and soft. I personally am more likely to spend money on a conditioner or styling product than on a shampoo, but I would recommend this product to someone who wants to try a higher-end shampoo or who is seeking shiny hair. This is not normal for me unless I am using a sulfate free shampoo. I do not believe this shampoo is sulfate free, so I was confused as to why the cleaning properties were underwhelming for me. Title: Not for me

ReviewText: I have washed my hair three times with Ultimate Restore Shampoo and followed each washing with Ultimate Restore Conditioner. I used the shampoo twice on each occasion, followed by a dollop of the conditioner. The fragrance of each was mild, and the second wash produced generous cleansing suds. My hair was squeaky clean. After using the conditioner and blow-drying, my hair not only looked thicker but also had a lovely shine. I take medication for Rheumatoid Arthritis that not only thins my salt/pepper hair but also makes it fly-away and difficult to manage. After using the shampoo and thick conditioner, my locks were not only squeaky clean but also shiny and easy to manage. I would purchase this product and recommend it to anyone whose hair is thinning but also coarse in texture. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Title: Good Shampoo!

A single lathering will do the trick and my hair is left feeling super-clean. It may take more time to determine whether it has an overly drying effect, but so far my hair is behaving very well when I use the StriVectin conditioner with it. After a good rinse-out of the shampoo I do feel a volume increase in my hair, and that sense of volume remains after I condition. All in all, it's pretty encouraging. Using the shampoo and conditioner I am seeing a thicker appearance after blow-drying. The effect seems cumulative; the first use showed me a hint of possible volume increase, the second a little more and the third time it's definitely looking fuller. The fullness stays with me throughout the day. I expect I'll have to alternate with a different brand or formula from time to time as a cumulative effect can go overboard after several consecutive applications. We'll see how the rest of the sample goes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Title: Fine hair

Description: Revitalize from root to tip. Gentle shampoo with a balanced pH comforts as it cleanses to soothe scalp without stripping hair of natural oils. Delivers vital nourishment for improved tensile strength.
ReviewText:
I agreed to sample this expecting to be disappointed and having my hair become dried out. Boy was I surprised when exactly the opposite occurred! I could feel the difference during the washing as the creamy product lathered my hair. It began to feel thicker and fuller in my hands, possibly even stronger. I've been a devotee to Wen products for years, but this Strivectin has something more to offer. I followed with the conditioner, which I normally never use, and I loved the lightness of it and the scent. I allowed my hair to air dry, then styled with a blowout. I got the height on the crown I normally don't get with my Wen, and my hair looked fuller and felt thicker when I finished my blowout.
I don't have grays, but I have a few whites that come in around my forehead so I use eSalon root touch up. Strivectin shampoo seemed to protect my color and my entire head of hair appeared vibrant. It lasted throughout the seven days I waited to test how long I could go before the benefits ended. I restyled during that time, and the volume held each time. My hair felt great, and I was confident I looked my best each day I left my house.
Since I was given the sample, I don't even know the price, but as soon as my budget allows, I will incorporate this product into my hair regime.
It's worth a try to attain some great benefits. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Title: VA VA VOLJME

Description: For damaged or thinning Hair. Patented NIA-114TM + Vitacycle Optimizing Complex. Restore from the inside, out. ReviewText: First let me say that Strivectin makes great products.  I use their SD and the Tightening line, both are excellent.  The hair mask from this line is also great and the shampoo and conditioner are pretty good, too.  This product, however, was a total fail for me.  So disappointed.  For a product that's supposed to help fine hair, which I have, it made it look greasy, as in it looked like I hadn't washed it in three days.  Totally flat and gross.  Densifying???  Absolutely not.  Total opposite.  Strivectin, what were you thinking with this one ????

Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:
you need this product if...
you are a true multi-tasker
you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather
you want to indulge in a margarita without the calories
you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText:
summer just doesn't seem right without senorita margarita! i look forward to grabbing one every summer ... the scent is a wonderful mix of fresh lime and a bubbly effervescense, which i find absolutely and wonderfully invigorating to the senses. all you need to add to this duo is a cabana on the beach, some tropical music and a warm sunny day, and you've got everything just right!

i have also used the matching salt scrub which is also just amazing! after using it in the shower, i found that senorita margarita layers well with the eternal grace fragrance, since it picks up on the citrus notes ... but i would love it if senorita margarita came in a body spritz!
Title: ahhh ... summertime!

Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:
you need this product if...
you are a true multi-tasker
you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather
you want to indulge in a margarita without the calories
you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText: I was so disappointed when Philosophy stopped making the Lime Bath & Body Gel. So I stopped buying Philosophy! Then a friend told me about the Margarita Shower Gel, I smelled a tester & it's very close to the old Lime Bath & Body Gel. So I bought 4 bottles & I absolutely love it!!! I travel with it & use it as a face, body & shampoo cleanser & that saves tons of space & gives me more room for my makeup. And I'm constantly receiving compliments & asked what fragrance I'm wearing & it's just the Margarita scent. I also love the Melon Bath & Body Gel. They're my favorites & I would highly recommend both!
Title: Fantastic

Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:

you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather

you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText:
smells so much like a real margarita! very much a strong, citrusy, sweet lime scent, but there actually is a hint of saltiness and alcohol! it's a little uncanny, but amazing! well done, philosophy!

this one is definitely a classic philosophy scent for summer. invokes feelings of being on a white sand beach, sipping a margarita with your toes in the water! very invigorating in the mornings and help to wake me up! makes me very happy too and is a great start to the day - as is anything philosophy :)

of course, this also makes such amazing bubbles and leaves my skin so soft, smooth, and clean!
Title: one of the best!

ReviewText: this is one of the more fun "flavors" philosophy has come up with. very sweet and tangy, and even the alcohol can be detected in the fragrance. fans of real margaritas will not be disappointed. this is more of a warm-weather shower gel for me due to its citrusy, zesty scent. I took off one star because although I really like the scent, it can be a bit too sweet at times. first thing in the morning is not a time where i can use this...it will give me a headache. however, it is perfect for later during the day, say after the gym.

ReviewText: senorita margarita is my stand by instant hit with anyone as far as sharing philosophy scents go. i have given this as gifts to countless of my friends and family. everyone loves it! it is always in my shower; my husband gives it high marks too. sm is very fresh, fruity lime, refreshing. you get a hint of the salt and the combo is addicting! please, please don't ever stop making this scent. in hot humid weather it is a must have with a nice cold shower. oooh - wake me up and i am ready to face the day!
Title: everyone loves this margarita!

Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:
you need this product if...
you are a true multi-tasker
you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather
you want to indulge in a margarita without the calories
you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText:
i think this shower gel is one of philosophy's iconic products, and one of the ones that distinguishes philosophy's shower gels from other brands. it has the most creative and unique scent imaginable. yes it does smell like a margarita. it has the most incredible fresh tangy lime scent that is blended with a salty note that makes it so energizing and invigorating. it is also a terrific unisex scent that is so much fun to use.

senorita margarita is also one of philosophy's tea-lauryl sulfate formulas, which makes it very rich and creamy and extra moisturizing. this formula is too good to be true.

i can't even count how many bottles of senorita margarita i've used over the years. it is a nice change from all of my graces, florals, and foodie scents, and it is one of my philosophy favorites.
Title: this one is special

Title: almost as good as having a margarita :)

ReviewText:
This is perhaps my favorite fragrance of all the shower gels, but I have used almost all the others and can't say anything negative. It's a terrific soap for the shower and an even better shampoo. How easy can that be? And there are special seasonal fragrances at holiday time which are fun and festive. I use the fruit flavored ones in summer and the others in winter, depending on my current likes. when i travel, i always take it with me.

Love, love, love this stuff!
Title: Haven't used anything else in years

ReviewText: i love all of the foodie shower gels and stayed away from this one because i'm not a huge fan of a sour lime smell (or tequila). i finally caved after hearing so many great reviews. i'm so glad i picked this one up - the gel is so refreshing. you can really pick up on the citrusey lime with a little sweet burst of triple sec! Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:
you need this product if...

you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather
you want to indulge in a margarita without the calories
you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText:
I have used just philosophy 3-in-1 shower gels since I was first introduced to them over 6 years ago, and after all the flavors I've tried, this is definitely in my top three all-time favorites. This just bursts with tangy, wonderful lime. You can smell the lime, salt, mixer and all. There is a zesty freshness to it, a liveliness. If a scent can smell like happiness, this is it! Perfect for the summer, or in the winter when you need a sunny pick-me-up from the weather.

Like the other philosophy shower gels I've tried, this formula has a wonderful lather yet is safe for people with sensitive skin like me. Senorita margarita is a perfectly full-volume scent but doesn't stay with you once the shower is done. I love that Philosophy gives you so much incredible scent while in the shower- it just turns your shower into the most enjoyable experience. And with this particular shower gel- a downright party!

you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over

Title: Life saver for curls!

Description: Over night Anti-Frizz Serum For Frizz-Prone Hair Smart treatment balances moisture within strands and repairs porous, damaged cuticles over time for lasting frizz control.
ReviewText: I personally think this is one of my favorite products from the All Smooth line. Although it says serum it is not the typical watery or oil based serum you might think of. This is more like a very light weight cream. I have very thin hair, but dry with split ends. This definitely made my split ends nearly disappear. It smoothes out my ends so I don't have the frizzy ends. I am very happy with this. Unlike the previous review I read, it does not leave my hair feeling dirty. I only add this from midshaft to the ends. My hair nearly reaches my waist.
Title: Smoothing

Description: Over night Anti-Frizz Serum For Frizz-Prone Hair Smart treatment balances moisture within strands and repairs porous, damaged cuticles over time for lasting frizz control.
ReviewText: I got a small size of this as a christmas gift. i have used it every day after i get out of the shower along with using the shampoo and conditioner in the shower. i found that it did de-frizz my hair and my hair has been a lot more manageable. but, my hair has been greasier and dirtier looking after a shorter period of time.

ReviewText: I bought this a few weeks ago and its really helping my hair a lot. Its totally worth a try if you have dry scalp and hair.
Title: Worth the money!

Description: PHYTOLIUM 4 is a botanical concentrate designed to treat lifeless hair, giving it strength and resistance. For lifeless hair.
ReviewText: I recently had quite a few optimum points and decided to splurge on this product that I had previously never seen. I'm conflicted because On one hand I wish I had never tried this product and  on the other hand I can't see me going without this!  No doubt this is a pricey product but It has worked wonders ,in a short time to revitalize my dry, curly , dull hair.  I have shoulder length hair and was seriously thinking that my " aging " hair had to be cut short in order for it to look and be healthier. Since using the botanical concentrate My hair looks and feels amazing in just 3 weeks!  I'm going to be saving up my optimum points again to repurchase this gem as it is definately worth the splurge!
Title: Tried on a whim and love it!

Description: The BodyWaver features a unique hollow barrel design, Tourmaline SinglePass Radial Technology, and an ergonomic handle to make waves, create volume, and enhance shine with the ease of a pro stylisteven on second-day hair. Its like getting a polished blowout look without having to use a blow dryer and round brush.   Regular curling irons use a single central heat plate that is ineffective at heating the entire barrel. This results in temperature fluctuation, hot spots and damage due to over-styling. The BodyWaver works differently. Featuring a ring of ceramic heaters along the wall of the barrel, this iron delivers fast, consistent heat for healthy, long-lasting results.   Other features include: 5 Heat Settings to 410 F; Cool Tip; Stand; 9ft, 360 Swivel Cord; 1 Hour Auto Off; 2-Year Warranty.  Winner of Total Beauty Award for Best Styling Iron, 2014.
ReviewText:
I bought this a couple weeks ago after my less impressive drug-store brand curler went out. Usually I curl my hair knowing it'll flatten out by the time I get to work. Much to my surprise, this one gave my pretty curls after the first wrap around (usually i would have to curl the same piece of hair a couple times) so I'm actually done curling faster, and they were pretty much the same til lunch. It has been pretty humid lately so I'm not bothered at at all.
Bonus- now that they sell the T3 line at SDM, I get optimum points I can use for anything (versus the points collected at a certain beauty shop where you collect endless points for sample sizes of other products)
Title: Curls that stay

ReviewText: Amazing product. Definitely recommend. Works perfectly
Title: Amazing

Description:
This revolutionary gyroscopic curling iron features patent-pending motion-sensing technology and an auto-rotating barrel that senses the movement of your hand and automatically rotates in the desired direction to form perfect curls every time. With 5 heat settings up to 410F and 2 speeds, the Twirl 360 is ideal for any hair type or skill level. 

Engineered with T3 Tourmaline Ceramic technology, the Twirl 360 imparts ionic, infrared heat that seals in moisture and eliminates frizz. Featuring SinglePassTM technology, this iron maintains even heat across the barrel the entire time you are styling. The result? A long-lasting, smooth and shiny finish that's damage-free in one quick twirl. 

Other features include: Single Go" Button; Mid-Length Clamp; Cool Tip; Ergonomic Design; 9 ft, 360 Swivel Cord; 2-Year Warranty.
ReviewText: I really like this iron. It heats up very quickly and is the perfect size for loose curls. It is replacing a clipless wand iron that I had been using for a couple of years, so it's taking me a while to get used to it. I like the auto wind, it makes it easier to do the back my my hair. I have long hair. And unlike the wand, I haven't burned myself while trying to get used to it! I would definitely recommend this iron for people who want beachy waves.

Description:
Demanding hair meets its match. With 50% more power and 1.5" wide plates, the T3 SinglePass X is specifically designed to straighten Long, Thick or Coarse hairfast. Features an innovative Audio/Visual Interface, Advanced Digital SinglePass  technology that maintains consistent heat while styling to straighten in a single glide, and T3 Tourmaline + Ceramic + Ionic technology for a long-lasting, smooth and shiny finish. Includes 2 ultra-strong Pro Sectioning Clips for effortless styling. 

Other features include:  5 Heat Settings from 260F to 410F; Auto World Voltage (100-240V); 1 Hour Auto-Off; Ergonomic & Lightweight Design; 9 ft, 360 Swivel Cord; Heat-resistant Mat; 2-Year Warranty.
ReviewText: I purchased this T3 straightener a while back; I was hesitant at first because the price of it is slightly more than what I had paid for my previous flat iron but what convinced me to buy it was that the size of this flat iron is larger than many others out there. The first time I tried it I was very impressed with how cool and high tech it was; you can adjust to how high of a heat level you want and it lights up accordingly. Also, I love how much more time efficient it is for me to straighten my hair! The name really does say it all! Yes, the price of this is a little steep but you will not be disappointed with the product. Highly recommend!!

Description: Anna Sui's hair brush, her most exquisite accessory, will make brushing your hair a favourite nighttime ritual.
ReviewText: I actually was very disappointed when I received this in the mail as there is a bristle missing which I thought was a defect but is apparently the design, it doesn't show it in pictures barely but it is there. It is made out of very black glossy, hard plastic and quite obvious, will not be mistaken for a more luxe appearance. Functions decently but I don't know for how long as it is very delicate. Once customer service advised me that the product was not defective they sent me another one as I didn't want a refund as it was a gift from my boyfriend. You are buying this for the name not the design or quality. I would not purchase this myself.
Title: Disappointed

Description: Anna Sui's hair brush, her most exquisite accessory, will make brushing your hair a favourite nighttime ritual.
ReviewText: Okay, I bought this half because it's so pretty (love Japanese cosmetics; they know how to appeal to the female aesthetic) and also because I've heard boars hair brushes do wonders for hair. I haven't had a hairbrush in ages -- I use a comb for detangling -- but this brush is lovely. The combination of two different kinds of bristles means you get a great scalp massage while brushing. It eliminates static, which I find starts right about now as we head into colder weather. And it looks so nice sitting out on the bathroom counter.
Title: Worth the price

Description: Anna Sui's hair brush, her most exquisite accessory, will make brushing your hair a favourite nighttime ritual.
ReviewText:
I have long hair and I adore this brush it is darling to look at and it's great for my hair
This would be my second one since I discovered it love love love it
Title: Love this Anna Sui Hair Brush

Description: Anna Sui's hair brush, her most exquisite accessory, will make brushing your hair a favourite nighttime ritual.
ReviewText: After having this for more than half a year, I realized that I have been reaching for my daiso (dollar store) alternatives over this. This hair brush makes my hair extremely static, and have no amazing qualities over any other hair brushes that justifies the price. The brush is certainly beautiful, and will complete my Anna Sui collection, however, I do not think the item is worth the price.
Title: Makes my hair static
